verses.verse: חֲזוֹן֙ <S%H2377><s%> The vision יְשַֽׁעְיָ֣הוּ <S%H3470><s%> of Isaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אָמ֔וֹץ <S%H531><s%> of Amoz אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which חָזָ֔ה <S%H2372><s%> which he saw עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> concerning Judah וִירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> and Jerusalem בִּימֵ֨י <S%H3117><s%> in the days עֻזִּיָּ֧הוּ <S%H5818><s%> of Uzziah יוֹתָ֛ם <S%H3147><s%> Jotham אָחָ֥ז <S%H271><s%> Ahaz יְחִזְקִיָּ֖הוּ <S%H2396><s%> Hezekiah מַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> kings יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

שִׁמְע֤וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hear שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> O heavens וְהַאֲזִ֣ינִי <S%H238><s%> and give ear אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> O earth כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> For יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD דִּבֵּ֑ר <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken בָּנִים֙ <S%H1121><s%> children גִּדַּ֣לְתִּי <S%H1431><s%> I have nourished וְרוֹמַ֔מְתִּי <S%H7311><s%> and brought up וְהֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> they פָּ֥שְׁעוּ <S%H6586><s%> and they have rebelled בִֽי׃

יָדַ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> knoweth שׁוֹר֙ <S%H7794><s%> The ox קֹנֵ֔הוּ <S%H7069><s%> his owner וַחֲמ֖וֹר <S%H2543><s%> and the ass אֵב֣וּס <S%H18><s%> crib בְּעָלָ֑יו <S%H1167><s%> his master's יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> [but] Israel לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> does not יָדַ֔ע <S%H3045><s%> doth not know עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> my people לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not הִתְבּוֹנָֽן׃ <S%H995><s%> doth not consider

ה֣וֹי ׀ <S%H1945><s%> Ah גּ֣וֹי <S%H1471><s%> nation חֹטֵ֗א <S%H2398><s%> sinful עַ֚ם <S%H5971><s%> a people כֶּ֣בֶד <S%H3515><s%> laden עָוֹ֔ן <S%H5771><s%> with iniquity זֶ֣רַע <S%H2233><s%> a seed מְרֵעִ֔ים <S%H7489><s%> of evildoers בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> children מַשְׁחִיתִ֑ים <S%H7843><s%> that are corrupters עָזְב֣וּ <S%H5800><s%> have abandoned אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD נִֽאֲצ֛וּ <S%H5006><s%> unto anger אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קְד֥וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel נָזֹ֥רוּ <S%H2114><s%> they are gone away אָחֽוֹר׃ <S%H268><s%> backward

עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> and מֶ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> how long תֻכּ֛וּ <S%H5221><s%> Why should ye be stricken ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again תּוֹסִ֣יפוּ <S%H3254><s%> more and more סָרָ֑ה <S%H5627><s%> any more? ye will revolt כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and the whole רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> the whole head לָחֳלִ֔י <S%H2483><s%> is sick וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and the whole לֵבָ֖ב <S%H3824><s%> and the whole heart דַּוָּֽי׃ <S%H1742><s%> faint

מִכַּף־ <S%H3709><s%> From the sole רֶ֤גֶל <S%H7272><s%> of the foot וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> even רֹאשׁ֙ <S%H7218><s%> even unto the head אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> There בּ֣וֹ מְתֹ֔ם <S%H4974><s%> [there is] no soundness פֶּ֥צַע <S%H6482><s%> in it [but] wounds וְחַבּוּרָ֖ה <S%H2250><s%> and bruises וּמַכָּ֣ה <S%H4347><s%> sores טְרִיָּ֑ה <S%H2961><s%> and putrifying לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor זֹ֙רוּ֙ <S%H2115><s%> they have not been closed וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor חֻבָּ֔שׁוּ <S%H2280><s%> neither bound up וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor רֻכְּכָ֖ה <S%H7401><s%> neither mollified בַּשָּֽׁמֶן׃ <S%H8081><s%> with ointment

אַרְצְכֶ֣ם <S%H776><s%> Your country שְׁמָמָ֔ה <S%H8077><s%> [is] desolate עָרֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5892><s%> your cities שְׂרֻפ֣וֹת <S%H8313><s%> [are] burned אֵ֑שׁ <S%H784><s%> with fire אַדְמַתְכֶ֗ם <S%H127><s%> your land לְנֶגְדְּכֶם֙ <S%H5048><s%> your presence זָרִים֙ <S%H2114><s%> strangers אֹכְלִ֣ים <S%H398><s%> devour אֹתָ֔הּ <S%H853><s%> וּשְׁמָמָ֖ה <S%H8077><s%> it in your presence and [it is] desolate כְּמַהְפֵּכַ֥ת <S%H4114><s%> as overthrown זָרִֽים׃ <S%H2114><s%> by strangers

וְנוֹתְרָ֥ה <S%H3498><s%> is left בַת־ <S%H1323><s%> And the daughter צִיּ֖וֹן <S%H6726><s%> of Zion כְּסֻכָּ֣ה <S%H5521><s%> as a cottage בְכָ֑רֶם <S%H3754><s%> in a vineyard כִּמְלוּנָ֥ה <S%H4412><s%> as a lodge בְמִקְשָׁ֖ה <S%H4750><s%> in a garden of cucumbers כְּעִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> city נְצוּרָֽה׃ <S%H5341><s%> as a besieged

לוּלֵי֙ <S%H3884><s%> Except יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts הוֹתִ֥יר <S%H3498><s%> had left לָ֛נוּ שָׂרִ֖יד <S%H8300><s%> remnant כִּמְעָ֑ט <S%H4592><s%> unto us a very small כִּסְדֹ֣ם <S%H5467><s%> as Sodom הָיִ֔ינוּ <S%H1961><s%> we should have been לַעֲמֹרָ֖ה <S%H6017><s%> unto Gomorrah דָּמִֽינוּ׃ <S%H1819><s%> [and] we should have been like ס

שִׁמְע֥וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hear דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God קְצִינֵ֣י <S%H7101><s%> ye rulers סְדֹ֑ם <S%H5467><s%> of Sodom הַאֲזִ֛ינוּ <S%H238><s%> give ear תּוֹרַ֥ת <S%H8451><s%> unto the law אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <S%H430><s%> of our God עַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> ye people עֲמֹרָֽה׃ <S%H6017><s%> of Gomorrah

לָמָּה־ <S%H4100><s%> To what לִּ֤י רֹב־ <S%H7230><s%> purpose [is] the multitude זִבְחֵיכֶם֙ <S%H2077><s%> of your sacrifices יֹאמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> unto me? saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD שָׂבַ֛עְתִּי <S%H7646><s%> I am full עֹל֥וֹת <S%H5930><s%> of the burnt offerings אֵילִ֖ים <S%H352><s%> of rams וְחֵ֣לֶב <S%H2459><s%> and the fat מְרִיאִ֑ים <S%H4806><s%> of fed beasts וְדַ֨ם <S%H1818><s%> not in the blood פָּרִ֧ים <S%H6499><s%> of bullocks וּכְבָשִׂ֛ים <S%H3532><s%> or of lambs וְעַתּוּדִ֖ים <S%H6260><s%> or of he goats לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no חָפָֽצְתִּי׃ <S%H2654><s%> and I delight

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> When תָבֹ֔אוּ <S%H935><s%> When ye come לֵרָא֖וֹת <S%H7200><s%> to appear פָּנָ֑י <S%H6440><s%> before מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who בִקֵּ֥שׁ <S%H1245><s%> me who hath required זֹ֛את <S%H2063><s%> at מִיֶּדְכֶ֖ם <S%H3027><s%> this at your hand רְמֹ֥ס <S%H7429><s%> to tread חֲצֵרָֽי׃ <S%H2691><s%> court

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no תוֹסִ֗יפוּ <S%H3254><s%> no more הָבִיא֙ <S%H935><s%> Bring מִנְחַת־ <S%H4503><s%> oblations שָׁ֔וְא <S%H7723><s%> vain קְטֹ֧רֶת <S%H7004><s%> incense תּוֹעֵבָ֛ה <S%H8441><s%> is an abomination הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> he לִ֑י חֹ֤דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> unto me the new moons וְשַׁבָּת֙ <S%H7676><s%> and sabbaths קְרֹ֣א <S%H7121><s%> the calling מִקְרָ֔א <S%H4744><s%> of assemblies לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no אוּכַ֥ל <S%H3201><s%> I cannot away with אָ֖וֶן <S%H205><s%> [it is] iniquity וַעֲצָרָֽה׃ <S%H6116><s%> even the solemn meeting

חָדְשֵׁיכֶ֤ם <S%H2320><s%> Your new moons וּמוֹעֲדֵיכֶם֙ <S%H4150><s%> and your appointed feasts שָׂנְאָ֣ה <S%H8130><s%> hateth נַפְשִׁ֔י <S%H5315><s%> my soul הָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> have become עָלַ֖י <S%H5921><s%> and לָטֹ֑רַח <S%H2960><s%> they are a trouble נִלְאֵ֖יתִי <S%H3811><s%> unto me I am weary נְשֹֽׂא׃ <S%H5375><s%> to bear

וּבְפָרִשְׂכֶ֣ם <S%H6566><s%> And when ye spread forth כַּפֵּיכֶ֗ם <S%H3709><s%> your hands אַעְלִ֤ים <S%H5956><s%> I will hide עֵינַי֙ <S%H5869><s%> mine eyes מִכֶּ֔ם <S%H4480><s%> at גַּ֛ם <S%H1571><s%> Yes כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> though תַרְבּ֥וּ <S%H7235><s%> from you yea when ye make many תְפִלָּ֖ה <S%H8605><s%> prayers אֵינֶ֣נִּי <S%H369><s%> will not שֹׁמֵ֑עַ <S%H8085><s%> I will not hear יְדֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H3027><s%> your hands דָּמִ֥ים <S%H1818><s%> of blood מָלֵֽאוּ׃ <S%H4390><s%> are full

רַחֲצוּ֙ <S%H7364><s%> Wash הִזַּכּ֔וּ <S%H2135><s%> you make you clean הָסִ֛ירוּ <S%H5493><s%> put away רֹ֥עַ <S%H7455><s%> the evil מַעַלְלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H4611><s%> of your doings מִנֶּ֣גֶד <S%H5048><s%> from before עֵינָ֑י <S%H5869><s%> mine eyes חִדְל֖וּ <S%H2308><s%> cease הָרֵֽעַ׃ <S%H7489><s%> to do evil

לִמְד֥וּ <S%H3925><s%> Learn הֵיטֵ֛ב <S%H3190><s%> to do well דִּרְשׁ֥וּ <S%H1875><s%> seek מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> judgment אַשְּׁר֣וּ <S%H833><s%> relieve חָמ֑וֹץ <S%H2541><s%> the oppressed שִׁפְט֣וּ <S%H8199><s%> judge יָת֔וֹם <S%H3490><s%> the fatherless רִ֖יבוּ <S%H7378><s%> plead אַלְמָנָֽה׃ <S%H490><s%> for the widow ס

לְכוּ־ <S%H1980><s%> Come נָ֛א <S%H4994><s%> now וְנִוָּֽכְחָ֖ה <S%H3198><s%> and let us reason together יֹאמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Though יִֽהְי֨וּ <S%H1961><s%> become חֲטָאֵיכֶ֤ם <S%H2399><s%> though your sins כַּשָּׁנִים֙ <S%H8144><s%> be as scarlet כַּשֶּׁ֣לֶג <S%H7950><s%> as snow יַלְבִּ֔ינוּ <S%H3835><s%> they shall be as white אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Though יַאְדִּ֥ימוּ <S%H119><s%> though they be red כַתּוֹלָ֖ע <S%H8438><s%> like crimson כַּצֶּ֥מֶר <S%H6785><s%> they shall be as wool יִהְיֽוּ׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If תֹּאב֖וּ <S%H14><s%> If ye be willing וּשְׁמַעְתֶּ֑ם <S%H8085><s%> and obedient ט֥וּב <S%H2898><s%> the good הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land תֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> ye shall eat

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if תְּמָאֲנ֖וּ <S%H3985><s%> But if ye refuse וּמְרִיתֶ֑ם <S%H4784><s%> and rebel חֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> with the sword תְּאֻכְּל֔וּ <S%H398><s%> ye shall be devoured כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> Truly פִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> for the mouth יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD דִּבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken ס

אֵיכָה֙ <S%H349><s%> how הָיְתָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> has become לְזוֹנָ֔ה <S%H2181><s%> become an harlot קִרְיָ֖ה <S%H7151><s%> city נֶאֱמָנָ֑ה <S%H539><s%> How is the faithful מְלֵאֲתִ֣י <S%H4395><s%> fruit מִשְׁפָּ֗ט <S%H4941><s%> of judgment צֶ֛דֶק <S%H6664><s%> righteousness יָלִ֥ין <S%H3885><s%> lodged בָּ֖הּ וְעַתָּ֥ה <S%H6258><s%> now מְרַצְּחִֽים׃ <S%H7523><s%> in it but now murderers

כַּסְפֵּ֖ךְ <S%H3701><s%> Thy silver הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> has become לְסִיגִ֑ים <S%H5509><s%> is become dross סָבְאֵ֖ךְ <S%H5435><s%> thy wine מָה֥וּל <S%H4107><s%> mixed בַּמָּֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> with water

שָׂרַ֣יִךְ <S%H8269><s%> Thy princes סוֹרְרִ֗ים <S%H5637><s%> [are] rebellious וְחַבְרֵי֙ <S%H2270><s%> and companions גַּנָּבִ֔ים <S%H1590><s%> of thieves כֻּלּוֹ֙ <S%H3605><s%> Everyone אֹהֵ֣ב <S%H157><s%> every one loveth שֹׁ֔חַד <S%H7810><s%> gifts וְרֹדֵ֖ף <S%H7291><s%> and followeth שַׁלְמֹנִ֑ים <S%H8021><s%> after rewards יָתוֹם֙ <S%H3490><s%> not the fatherless לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יִשְׁפֹּ֔טוּ <S%H8199><s%> they judge וְרִ֥יב <S%H7379><s%> neither doth the cause אַלְמָנָ֖ה <S%H490><s%> of the widow לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> come אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> before פ

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore נְאֻ֤ם <S%H5002><s%> Therefore saith הָֽאָדוֹן֙ <S%H113><s%> the Lord יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֲבִ֖יר <S%H46><s%> the mighty One יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel ה֚וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Ah אֶנָּחֵ֣ם <S%H5162><s%> I will ease מִצָּרַ֔י <S%H6862><s%> me of mine adversaries וְאִנָּקְמָ֖ה <S%H5358><s%> and avenge מֵאוֹיְבָֽי׃ <S%H341><s%> me of mine enemies
